message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. The value this product holds for you is estimated at $8000, and we aim to ensure a fair transaction. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, I would like to offer you the chance to acquire it for $10000. This price reflects its high quality and the significant return on investment it promises. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
